name: VaporClicker
description:
Are you sick of being a nice person?

Show people how much you actually don't care with this antisocialzing clicker game on your android device.

Keep clicking on a rotating middle finger to show how many f*cks you don't give. More clicks means more coolness for you!

The VaporClicker features:

  • F*ck Upgrades: Get MULTIS and GHOSTS to care less faster
  • Story Mode: After every 4 Upgrades you get rewarded with nice puns from the worlds totally not smartest AI
  •  Local Multiplayer: Do antisocialzing with your friends! Meet up and click with your friends on one phone
  • Rotation Control: Swipe to rotate the Middle Finger! (Totally not a feature because I wanted to know how swiping works)
  •  Vaporwave: Are you an aesthetic person? VaporClicker is set in a beautiful vaporwave artstyle

Download now for FREE and thats a great price!

Play now VaporClicker on your android device and be the coolest!
